SMTG_TMPL_HDR_T.NAME: Email Notification for Completed Supplier Invoice Approval
SMTG_TMPL_HDR_T.DESCRIPTION: Email Notification for Completed Supplier Invoice Approval

SMTG_TMPL_CONT.SUBJECT: Supplier Invoice {{SupplierInvoice}} {{FiscalYear}} is Approved
SMTG_TMPL_CONT.BODY_TXT: Dear User, the workflow for the completed supplier invoice {{SupplierInvoice}} / {{FiscalYear}} / {{CompanyCodeName}} ({{CompanyCode}}) for supplier {{SupplierName}} ({{InvoicingParty}}) with amount {{InvoiceGrossAmount}} {{DocumentCurrency}} has been approved. Best Regards
SMTG_TMPL_CONT.BODY_HTML:
Dear User,

the workflow for the completed supplier invoice {{SupplierInvoice}} / {{FiscalYear}} / {{CompanyCodeName}} ({{CompanyCode}}) for supplier {{SupplierName}} ({{InvoicingParty}}) with amount {{InvoiceGrossAmount}} {{DocumentCurrency}} has been approved.

Best Regards

SMTG_TMPL_CONT.SUBJECT: Lieferantenrechnung {{SupplierInvoice}} {{FiscalYear}} genehmigt
SMTG_TMPL_CONT.BODY_TXT: Sehr geehrter Benutzer, der Workflow für die vervollständigte Lieferantenrechnung {{SupplierInvoice}} / {{FiscalYear}} / {{CompanyCodeName}} ({{CompanyCode}}) für Lieferant {{SupplierName}} ({{InvoicingParty}}) mit dem Betrag {{InvoiceGrossAmount}} {{DocumentCurrency}} wurde genehmigt. Mit freundlichen Grüßen
SMTG_TMPL_CONT.BODY_HTML:
Sehr geehrter Benutzer,

der Workflow für die vervollständigte Lieferantenrechnung {{SupplierInvoice}} / {{FiscalYear}} / {{CompanyCodeName}} ({{CompanyCode}}) für Lieferant {{SupplierName}} ({{InvoicingParty}}) mit dem Betrag {{InvoiceGrossAmount}}{{DocumentCurrency}} wurde genehmigt.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen
